results.idea: 1-min post-news momentum scaled by volume volatility
results.description: Combine short-term price move and volume surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). Both datafields have high coverage and userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: used ≤2 datafields and ≤7 operators. Confidence: 0.72 — short-term momentum after news with volume scaling is well-documented.

results.idea: 5-min reversal after an extreme 1-min move
results.description: Look for mean-reversion after a sudden 1-min jump. Uses news_pct_1min and news_pct_5_min (SUGGESTION1). Both fields have good coverage so no ts_backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.58 — reasonable intraday reversal but noisy.

results.idea: Post-news 10-min momentum normalized across cross-section
results.description: Cross-sectional momentum: news_pct_10min normalized by cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION1 used. High coverage. SUGGESTION4: field has moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Volume surprise breakout: curr vol vs 30-day mov vol
results.description: Use news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol to detect breakout. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied (mov_vol has high userCount). KEEP_IN_MIND: ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.70 — volume spikes often precede sustained moves.

results.idea: Gap fade strategy: fade open-gap when extreme
results.description: Use news_open_gap to identify large gaps. Coverage ~0.6247; SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill if needed. Single field. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.6 — gap fades work but depend on context.

results.idea: Earnings surprise drift proxy: immediate post-news return
results.description: Use news_eps_actual proxy combined with subsequent 30min return (news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION1 used; eps_actual has high coverage. No SUGGESTION2. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.64 — earnings drift exists but needs real surprise data.

results.idea: High-low asymmetry momentum (LS) scaled by volatility
results.description: Use news_ls (directional short-long indicator) and news_atr14 to scale conviction. news_ls coverage low (0.488) so applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Post-news high-exc stddev breakout
results.description: Use news_high_exc_stddev to capture extreme upward moves beyond 30-day SD. SUGGESTION1 not needed (single field). Field has high coverage and alphaCount so SUGGESTION4 favored. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Post-news low-exc stddev mean-revert
results.description: Use news_low_exc_stddev to detect extreme down moves to fade. High coverage; single-field. SUGGESTIONS considered. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by market move (index-relative)
results.description: Use news_indx_perf which already measures index-relative move. High coverage and userCount apply SUGGESTION4. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Tiny-window micro momentum: 30-sec reaction
results.description: Use news_pct_30sec to capture ultra-short reactions. Coverage high. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.5 — microstructure noise high.

results.idea: Short-term continuation if 1min and 5min align
results.description: Require alignment between news_pct_1min and news_pct_5_min using multiply to accentuate co-movement. SUGGESTION1 used. Fields coverage ok. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Volatility breakout signaled by ATR ratio
results.description: Use news_atr_ratio to detect days with big range vs 20-day avg. High coverage and alphaCount — SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: EOD drift: close beyond TONLast scaled by cap
results.description: Use news_eod_close and news_cap: bigger moves in small caps often larger. SUGGESTION1 used, both fields high coverage and userCount (cap high). Keep operators ≤7. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: VWAP reversion: price vs post_vwap
results.description: Compare news_ton_last to news_post_vwap to detect reversion to VWAP. Both fields high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Pre- vs post-session momentum (pre_vwap -> post_vwap)
results.description: Compare news_pre_vwap to news_post_vwap. Both have decent coverage; applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 preference for higher counts. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Short-interest contrarian: fade high short-interest rallies
results.description: Use news_short_interest with news_pct_30min to detect squeezes vs genuine moves. Short_interest has high coverage. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Volume-weighted breakout using main_vwap and curr_vol
results.description: Compare news_main_vwap move relative to TONLast and scale by curr_vol. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND okay. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Intraday momentum decay: 1min -> 60min fade
results.description: If big 1-min move but decays by 60min, fade continuation. Use news_pct_1min and news_pct_60min. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Tick activity surge predict short-term move
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks and news_pct_5_min; tot_ticks high userCount. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Session range breakout normalized by vol stddev
results.description: Use news_session_range and news_vol_stddev to pick real breakouts. Session_range coverage moderate; vol_stddev high. SUGGESTION3 not required. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum after large after-news high (max_up_ret)
results.description: Use news_max_up_ret to capture strong up moves post news. High coverage. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Fading after large after-news down (max_dn_ret)
results.description: Use news_max_dn_ret to detect large drops to fade. High coverage and alphaCount. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Relative strength vs SPY: news_spy close-adjusted move
results.description: Use news_spy_close and news_spy_last already embedded in news_indx_perf but implement cross-check using news_ton_last and news_spy_last. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.59.
results.implementation: subtract(divide(subtract(news_eod_close, news_ton_last), news_ton_last), divide(subtract(news_spy_close, news_spy_last), news_spy_last))

results.idea: Price-speed signal: minutes-to-1% up (nws12_mainz_1l)
results.description: Faster time-to-1% indicates strong buying pressure. Use nws12_mainz_1l (high coverage). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Short-term skew: 1min pct vs 30min pct
results.description: Compare immediate to medium reaction: news_pct_1min vs news_pct_30min; SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Post-news dispersion: range relative to 30-day avg
results.description: Use news_range_stddev (range standardized) to find over/under reaction. Coverage ~0.6172 so borderline; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill if missing. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Micro-mean reversion using 30-sec and 1min
results.description: If 30-sec and 1-min moves diverge, expect reversion. Uses news_pct_30sec and news_pct_1min. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: High-frequency volume-adjusted directionality
results.description: Multiply direction (sign of news_pct_1min) by vol surprise. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Post-news volatility collapse trade
results.description: If ATR ratio spikes then collapses, enter momentum. Use news_atr_ratio and ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Overreaction fade: big 120min move vs 30min
results.description: If 30min move is large but 120min move smaller, fade. Uses news_pct_30min and news_pct_120min. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum confirmed by tick acceleration
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks growth vs daily mean (mov_vol proxy) with news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1 used and fields have high counts. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Price-to-earnings momentum: PE ratio re-rating
results.description: Use news_pe_ratio and recent price change (news_pct_30min). PE has high userCount. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Post-news run-up: ton_high vs ton_last
results.description: If ton_high >> ton_last immediately, expect continuation intraday. Use news_ton_high and news_ton_last. Both high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Immediate microstructure momentum: mins_to_1pct_up
results.description: Use news_mins_1_pct_up to measure speed of upward moves; faster => stronger. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Post-news realized volatility vs expected (vol stddev)
results.description: Compare news_vol_stddev to recent history to find regime; use ts_zscore. High coverage. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: After-hours momentum using nws12_afterhsz_1_minute
results.description: Capture after-hours immediate move using field nws12_afterhsz_1_minute. Coverage ~0.255 low, so applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.48 — after-hours noisy.

results.idea: Pre-market gap continuation using pre_vwap and opengap
results.description: Combine news_pre_vwap and news_open_gap to detect directional continuation. Both fields okay. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: 1-min momentum weighted by market-relative perf
results.description: Scale news_pct_1min by news_indx_perf to get alpha that isolates idiosyncratic moves. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum in low-liquidity names scaled by mov_vol
results.description: Use news_mov_vol and news_pct_30min; low mov_vol increases signal risk but higher reward. SUGGESTION1 used and high alphaCount for mov_vol. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Post-news range expansion combined with volume surge
results.description: Use news_session_range_pct and news_ratio_vol. session_range_pct coverage low (0.268) so SUGGESTION3 apply ts_backfill. KEEP_IN_MIND kept ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Cross-time confirmation: 5min and 30min both strong
results.description: Require both news_pct_5_min and news_pct_30min high and aligned via multiply. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Large-cap drift: strong moves in high cap names
results.description: Multiply news_pct_60min by news_cap to favor large-cap continuation. news_cap high userCount and alphaCount (SUGGESTION4). KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Pre-vs-tonlast reversal signal
results.description: If news_pre_vwap >> ton_last, expect reversion intraday. Use two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Minute-count to 3% (speed) as momentum predictor
results.description: Use news_mins_3_chg or nws12_mainz_3l depending on session. Chosen nws12_mainz_3l for higher coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Post-news consolidation breakout: small 30min move but vol uptick
results.description: Small news_pct_30min but high news_vol_stddev indicates imminent breakout. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Relative 10-min strength among peers (cross-section)
results.description: Use quantile of news_pct_10min across universe (zscore). SUGGESTION1 minimal. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by high recent ticks (liquidity confirmation)
results.description: Require news_tot_ticks above recent mean to trust news_pct_1min. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Post-news up-move persistence when ton_high > eod_vwap
results.description: Compare news_ton_high and news_eod_vwap to capture persistent buys. SUGGESTION1 used; fields high coverage. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low prior day return (novelty)
results.description: Use news_prev_day_ret and news_pct_30min; if prior day muted but current moves strong, stronger signal. prev_day_ret coverage ok. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Intraday squeeze detection: high short interest + rapid up ticks
results.description: Multiply news_short_interest and inverse minutes-to-1% up (nws12_mainz_1l). Both fields have decent coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Fade extreme intraday vwap deviation
results.description: If news_eod_vwap deviates greatly from ton_last, fade large deviations. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum persistence via ts_ir of pct_5_min
results.description: Use ts_ir(news_pct_5_min, d) to measure persistent directional info. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Overnight gap continuation if prior close strong (prev_close + open gap)
results.description: Use news_prev_close (low coverage) with news_open; applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill(news_prev_close,5). KEEP_IN_MIND used ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Short-term breakout if 10min pct and tot_ticks both high
results.description: Combine news_pct_10min and news_tot_ticks (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Mean reversion after extreme eod_high relative to ton_last
results.description: If news_eod_high far above ton_last (high_exc_stddev) then expect partial reversion. SUGGESTION1 single field news_high_exc_stddev. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Post-release quick drift predictor using pct_5_min and pct_60min alignment
results.description: Require alignment 5min->60min via multiply. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Directionally-weighted momentum using sign of eps_actual
results.description: Use sign(news_eps_actual) * recent pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 used. eps_actual coverage high. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Fade low-liquidity spikes using mov_vol and pct_1min
results.description: Downweight signals in low mov_vol via inverse scaling. SUGGESTION1 used; mov_vol high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Persistent move when post_vwap > main_vwap and vol spike
results.description: Use news_post_vwap, news_main_vwap and news_vol_stddev; but KEEP_IN_MIND max 2 fields, so combine post_vwap with vol_stddev. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum confirmed by eod_vwap surpassing ton_last
results.description: Use news_eod_vwap and news_ton_last to capture end-of-day buyer persistence. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term carry: predict next-period pct using ts_regression slope
results.description: Use ts_regression of news_pct_1min over short window to extract slope (ts_regression return type). KEEP_IN_MIND used single field. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: First-minute reversal in names with big open volume
results.description: Use news_open_vol and news_pct_1min. open_vol coverage 0.4361 (low) so apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Earnings magnitude scaled by cap to find mispricings
results.description: Use news_eps_actual and news_cap to prefer surprising effects in small caps; SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 (cap high userCount). KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: 50-day normalized eod close momentum (ts_zscore over 50)
results.description: Use news_eod_close with ts_zscore 50 to detect extended moves. Field has high coverage and alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: 1st minute continuation only when indx_perf supports it
results.description: Multiply news_pct_1min by news_indx_perf to avoid market-driven false signals. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Fade when price touches daily extreme quickly (mins to high/low)
results.description: Use news_mins_10_chg and news_mins_5_chg to see rapid extremes; coverage good. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Volatility contraction breakout: low vol then vol spike
results.description: Use news_vol_stddev to detect contraction then spike via ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 single field. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Confirmable move: pct_30min aligned with eod result1
results.description: Use news_pct_30min and nws12_mainz_result1 (both percent changes) — choose result1 field (high coverage). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by recent ticks per minute
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks normalized by session length (approx via ts_mean of tot_ticks) with news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Fade intraday spike when atm vol high (atr14)
results.description: If atr14 high and immediate spike occurs, fade due to noise. Use news_atr14 and news_pct_1min. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used (atr14 high userCount). Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Opening auction imbalance proxy: open_gap scaled by open_vol
results.description: Use news_open_gap and news_open_vol; open_vol coverage low so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured by ts_count_nans on pct_1min
results.description: Frequent valid values => persistent news; use ts_count_nans to weight — but ts_count_nans returns count; we use ts_count_nans(news_pct_1min,10). SUGGESTION1 applied single field. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: EOD gap continuation when prevday return was large
results.description: Use news_prev_day_ret and news_eod_close to detect continuation. prev_day_ret coverage ok. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Immediate post-news liquidity preference (trade only high mov_vol)
results.description: Trade only if news_mov_vol above threshold: use if_else with ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Post-news direction amplified by eps_actual magnitude
results.description: Use absolute eps_actual times direction of news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 used; eps_actual coverage high. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum when both tot_ticks and vol_ratio spike
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks and news_vol_ratio (curr_vol/mov_vol). Both high coverage in many variants. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Fade fast run-ups that lack volume support
results.description: If news_pct_1min large but news_curr_vol low vs mov_vol, fade. Use news_pct_1min and news_ratio_vol. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Cross-sectional extreme mover after news (top decile)
results.description: Bucket by quantile of news_pct_30min and trade extremes. SUGGESTION1 minimal. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Confirmable post-news trend: pct_10min persistent for 120min
results.description: If news_pct_10min and news_pct_120min same sign and magnitude, trust trend. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low range_stddev (clean moves)
results.description: Prefer moves when range_stddev low (less noise). Use news_range_stddev and news_pct_30min. range_stddev coverage ~0.6172; no backfill. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Overnight sentiment: pre_z vs post_z (nws12_prez vs nws12_mainz)
results.description: Compare premarket percent changes (nws12_prez_1_minute) to main session (nws12_mainz_1_minute). Choose fields with good coverage (mainz better). SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: 30-min continuation only when eod high confirms (high_exc_stddev)
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min with news_high_exc_stddev to avoid fake breakouts. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Late-session momentum: 90min pct scaled by cap
results.description: Use news_pct_90min and news_cap to favor large caps late-session persistence. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Fast-squeeze indicator: mins_to_10pct_up low + high short_interest
results.description: Use news_mins_10_chg and news_short_interest. mins coverage decent. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Post-news move quality: pct_5_min scaled by ts_ir
results.description: Use ts_ir(news_pct_5_min, d) as quality metric, multiply by pct_5_min. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum when both eod_vwap and main_vwap move same direction
results.description: Require news_eod_vwap and news_main_vwap alignment via multiply. Both fields high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Fade micro spikes that happen with low ticks
results.description: If news_pct_30sec large but tot_ticks low, fade. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Post-news directional conviction via sum of short windows
results.description: Aggregate short windows using ts_sum on pct_1min and pct_5_min indirectly by adding their zscores. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Relative move normalized by PE (cheap stocks move more)
results.description: Divide recent pct_30min by news_pe_ratio to favor cheap stocks. PE has high coverage/userCount. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Post-news consolidation detection via low session_range and low volstddev
results.description: Use news_session_range and news_vol_stddev; session_range coverage low so ts_backfill if missing. KEEP_IN_MIND ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Confirmation of breakout via pct_10min and max_up_ret
results.description: Use news_pct_10min and news_max_up_ret multiplicative confirmation. Both high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Intra-session trend strength: ratio of 60min to 10min pct
results.description: If 60min >> 10min then trend strengthening. Use news_pct_60min and news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Late reversal: big eod high but low 30min momentum
results.description: Use news_eod_high and news_pct_30min; if eod_high is extreme but 30min weak, fade. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Quantile momentum after news for top movers
results.description: Select top quantile of news_pct_5_min cross-section. SUGGESTION1 minimal. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Post-news mean-reversion when ATR high but volstddev low
results.description: Combine news_atr14 high with news_vol_stddev low as contradictory signals — fade. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: High-confidence breakout: pct_30min & vol_stddev both high
results.description: Require both strong price move and high vol_stddev; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Price vs TONLast momentum scaled by mov_vol
results.description: Measure relative move from ton_last to eod_close and scale by mov_vol. SUGGESTION1 used and mov_vol has high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Fast followed-by-slow confirmation: 1min >> 30min
results.description: If 1min large and 30min follows, use multiply; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum when eod_vwap crosses prevwap (pre to post)
results.description: Use news_pre_vwap and news_post_vwap; both decent coverage. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Microstructure filter: trade only if tot_ticks > median
results.description: Use ts_zscore(news_tot_ticks,30) threshold via if_else; SUGGESTION4 applied (tot_ticks high userCount). KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings impact scaled by percent move in 5min
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual with news_pct_5_min to weight actual EPS by immediate market reaction. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Fade when tiny 30-min move but large 120-min spike (mean reversion)
results.description: Use news_pct_30min and news_pct_120min to find reversals. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum only when normalized by group volatility proxy (volstddev)
results.description: Scale any pct signal by inverse vol stddev to favor stable trends. Use news_pct_10min and news_vol_stddev. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: High-conviction immediate trade when pct_30sec and pct_1min align
results.description: Require sign agreement of news_pct_30sec and news_pct_1min, then take the smaller magnitude. SUGGESTION1 used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Persistent up move when max_up_amt large and tot_ticks high
results.description: Use news_max_upamt and news_tot_ticks to confirm real buying. SUGGESTION1 used and both have high counts. Confidence: 0.64.
